34/*
35 * ex_stop -- :stop[!]
36 * :suspend[!]
37 * Suspend execution.
38 *
39 * PUBLIC: int ex_stop __P((SCR *, EXCMD *));
40 */
41int
42ex_stop(SCR *sp, EXCMD *cmdp)
43{
44 int allowed;
45
46 /* For some strange reason, the force flag turns off autowrite. */
47 if (!FL_ISSET(cmdp->iflags, E_C_FORCE) && file_aw(sp, FS_ALL))
48 return (1);
49
50 if (sp->gp->scr_suspend(sp, &allowed))
51 return (1);
52 if (!allowed)
53 ex_emsg(sp, NULL, EXM_NOSUSPEND);
54 return (0);
55}
